teststep.data: select * from tmx.EI_TIE_EXPORT_LOG where event_source = 'TLOG' and message like '%<register>301%' and message like '% <tran_no>15%' and message like '%<site>80%' and DATE_CREATED >= TO_DATE('03/24/2016 09:51:00', 'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI:SS')
teststep.result: Verify the following in tlog xml. <sales_amt></sales_amt> <cash_amt></cash_amt> <order_id></order_id> <order_site_no></order_site_no> <customer> <customer_id></customer_id> <first_name></first_name> <last_name></last_name> <suffix></suffix> <customer_email></customer_email><cust_promo_status></cust_promo_status> <ext_cust_id></ext_cust_id> <address> <line1></line1> <city></city> <state></state> <zip>11235</zip> <country></country> </address> <phone> <area></area> <number></number> </phone> </customer>

teststep.step: Wait for the batch job to run
Verify the email address in .EI_TIE_EXPORT_LOG. Make sure to enter the correct register, transaction and site number in the sql
teststep.data: select * from tmx.EI_TIE_EXPORT_LOG where event_source = 'TLOG' and message like '%<register>301%' and message like '% <tran_no>15%' and message like '%<site>80%' and DATE_CREATED >= TO_DATE('03/24/2016 09:51:00', 'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI:SS')
teststep.result: Email address entered at step 5 should display in TLOG message with inside the following tag <customer_email><customer_email>

teststep.step: Verify the email address in CUSTOMER_EMAIL_ID table
teststep.data: SELECT NAME FROM "TMX"."CUSTOMER_EMAIL_ID"; where = 'replace this text with email address'
teststep.result: Email address entered at step 5 should display in CUSTOMER_EMAIL_ID table

teststep.step: Wait for the nighly batch job to run
Log into Mainframe dB and run the sql with the phone number given in preconditions to verify the newly entered email exists in customer file
teststep.result: Customer's email entered in step 4 and 5 should get updated in dB as per the field to column mapping.
